website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward wall heater that is one of the best for a quick and simple installation.
pros: Comes as a full kit for a simple installation process
1,000W output is good enough for smaller rooms and spaces
Works in spaces up to 200 sq

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really turn "off"
customer_reviews.text: A very good heater, but with a thermostat that unfortunate activates even when "off" as soon as the room's temperature drops to the mid-forties. A convenient feature, perhaps, for bathroom or other plumbing-related installations, but "off" should mean off so that installations in an often-vacant space, such as our guest room, doesn't waste electricity by pumping out heat during cold winters when it isn't needed.
customer_reviews.author: BST

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but it does not come with a knockout clamp to hold the house wiring within the box. It does show that on the instructions so I had to stop the installations and go and get a clamp. It seems that it should have been included (only $0.80).
customer_reviews.author: Goldwing

customer_reviews.title: Instantaneous Warmth in a Cold Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this little heater! We installed it in our new poolhouse bathroom. It only takes seconds to warm the bathroom when using it in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: speycast4steelhead

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed in my bathroom. Install was easy and straightforward. Took maybe an hour- It seems to put out nice heat and is quite. We will see how it works as I use it over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Heats our shower drying off area nice. I had to add a door to to keep the heat in the area PS I used one of those Full glass barn doors from HD
customer_reviews.author: home body

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: These Cadet heaters have been around for many years. They are so easy to install and work great. I have installed many of they. All have worked perfect for many years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Henderson

customer_reviews.title: A fine heater
customer_reviews.text: There is no temperature control. It puts a nice heat out but not downward. I wanted it for my feet. It only goes up. It’s quiet but it’s not a strong fan. All in all it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Annapurnaji

customer_reviews.title: Install with electrician
customer_reviews.text: Works great but need to have an electrician install and would recommend thermostat on wall. Heats very well and does as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Easy too install
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had too use the heater yet.but it fits great in our bathroom. I’m sure it will be just what we need in the winter
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Schepens

customer_reviews.title: return was easy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatly electrician reccomended another way to heat building. Returning was easy. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great size and not noisy
customer_reviews.text: Really like this heater for a bathroom. Throws out so much heat so quickly. Not really very noisy either. I would highly recommend it. I have bought a couple of these.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smaller footprint than the old Cadet heater it replaced
customer_reviews.text: This works great at heating up my bathroom. I just wish it was the same size as the old (1970s) Cadet heater it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This little heater works great and kicks out a lot of heat. Very quiet, easy to install, and very affordable. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace an old Cadet. Same footprint. Even used the same sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Electric Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and keeps our pump house warm in winter
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Same heater as I had before. Decent heater for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The One

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, is what I ordered, installed easily and works great!
customer_reviews.author: bob yeadon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. I installed this in a bathroom. Heats the room up quickly. It was easy to install. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heater works great, but buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Heater works great, but buyer beware, we ordered the one with the thermostat included, the box said 'thermostat included', but the thermostat was not included. We didn't have time to return the item so we wired it with an external thermostat which works fine, but heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and very quiet, but....
customer_reviews.text: Works well and very quiet. The inside electrical parts (like coils and fan) are not protected. As a result if the enviromnet that is used in is Not very clean, the fan will accumulate dirtand might get clogged to a level that it will disable the heather.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what the listing said it was and it works great. I do feel that it took to long to ever ship out.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Knechtel

customer_reviews.title: BigBoy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my small office. Only problem was getting screw holes to line-up. But great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit Jones

customer_reviews.title: quick delivery, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great little bathroom heater. Easy to install. The 1500 w is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sweetveralou

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat wears out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater for my daughter's play room for some additional heat to make sure it stays nice and warm. Unfortunately, the thermostat wore out about 10 months into the heater's life so now it runs constantly. I have to turn if off at the electric panel which isn't very safe and very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: GC Alum08

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty
customer_reviews.text: Quiet for the amount of heat it puts out. We have these installed in our hallway and bedrooms. Not strong enough for a larger space, but perfect for a bedroom or bathroom size room. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: manifestlove

product_meta.title: Cadet CSC152TW Com-Pak 1500-Watt, 240V complete wall heater with thermostat, white
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingCadet Manufacturing 67506 White Hard Wired Com Pak Fan Forced Electric Heater 240V, 1500W has an adjustable, built-in thermostat. Wall can, high gloss enamel paint. 12"H x 9"W, UL listed.

specifications.Special Features: The Com-Pak is an efficient, affordable way to add warmth without installing ductwork. These hard-wired heaters have proven safety features, multiple installation options, and provide safe, sensible warmth for years.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
